item.description:
Come spend Mother’s Day with friends.

Don’t spend the day alone come enjoy the day with friends.

Located in northeast Massachusetts, in the Town of Danvers, Endicott Park encompasses 165 acres, and is home to some of the most unique and varied recreational land on the North Shore.

The park’s varied landscape includes pastoral views, historic farm buildings, orchards, woodlands, and marshes, with a network of trails and gravel roads for stress free and stroller friendly exploration of the park.

Please read the whole write up so we are all on the same page!

We will be at: Picnic Area 3 which is located in the North Front Orchard, look for the tent.  There are approximately 12 picnic tables situated directly next to parking lot.  This is the closest picnic site to the Visitor Center, restroom facilities and Children’s Barn and a perfect location for us.

As of now the forcast is 30% rain and approx. 64 degrees, we will have a tent (just in case) There are picnic tables there, feel free to bring your own chair, don't forget the sunscreen, hopefully we will need it.

Food: Is potluck style and bring your OWN beverage(s), alcohol free, bring a main dish, side or a dessert to share with the group, please put what you will be bringing in with your RSVP so everyone knows what everyone else is bringing.  We are all set for the: dishes, napkins, trash bags and silverware.  There shoudl be plenty of food so don’t over bring your item(s).

LOOK at the bottom of the page description page screen in the comment section to see what we will be eating.

 

Parking fee: There is a parking fee Residents $1.00/car.  NON resident $3.00/car.

Cost for the event: $2.00 each, (it costs to rent the picnic area).  NOTE: This cost WILL go down if enough people sign up, but please bring ones, so it is easier on me, remember ones are your friends, (lol) thank you!

Directions: http://www.endicottpark.com/#/directions-maps/4560133179 find where we will be from the map.

Weather: Please check back 2 days before the event to see if I have updated this information.  If there is NO update then see you there!

Games: If you have lawn games feel free to bring them, frisbee, volley ball net etc....

Time: Come for the day or stay a little while which ever works for you.


This event will be scheduled on my 2 Meetup sites, (Our Circle of Friends and Connection & Friends) there may be more people going to this event then you see.

Take a minute now and put the Meetup phone into your phone, that way if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it in your phone:  978-304-2811, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to spending Mother's Day with friends!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be at Picnic area 3, which is near the North Front Orchard.
item.name: Spend Mother's Day with Friends.
